(Simplified: 锱)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 甾 indicates the sound; 釒 (metal) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 釒 [ jīn ] gold, metal; money
    • 甾 [ zāi ] evil; a calamity
①古代重量單位，六銖等於一錙，四錙等於一兩：錙介(喻微小)。錙錘(喻微小)。錙銖(喻瑣碎的事或極少的錢)。
錙銖必較 [ zī zhū bì jiào ]: to haggle over every cent (idiom)
錙銖計較 [ zī zhū jì jiào ]: miserly (idiom)

錙字的基本解释

錙
zī
见“锱”。

錙字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zī］
［《廣韻》側持切，平之，莊。］
亦作“鍿1”。“锱1”的繁体字。
(1)古代重量单位。其说不一，或谓六铢，或谓八铢，或谓六两，或谓八两。一般从《说文》，谓六铢，即一两的四分之一。
(2)引申为少、细微。参见“錙介”、“錙銖”。
(3)通“緇”。黑色。参见“錙徒”。
(4)通“菑”。参见“錙壇之宫”。

錙字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　錙； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1310第12
【唐韻】側持切【集韻】【韻會】莊持切，?音菑。【說文】本作鍿。六銖也。【荀子·富國篇註】八兩曰錙。【正字通】古人言較量錙銖，謂輕微也。荀子註誤云八兩曰錙。正韻錙引荀註。韻會銖字註，八銖爲錙。?非。从說文爲正。　又【莊子·徐無鬼】無徒翼於錙壇之宮。【註】錙壇，壇名。

锱
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zī］
["Guangyun" side-cut, Pingzhi, Zhuang. ]
Also known as "鍿1". "锱1" in traditional characters.
(1) Ancient weight unit. It is not one, or six baht, or eight baht, or six liang, or eight liang. Generally speaking from "Shuowen", it is called six baht, which is one quarter of one or two.
(2) The extension is less and subtle. See "Qijie", "Qizhu".
(3) Through "缁". black. See "The Disciple".
(4) Through "菑". See "Palace of the Altar".
锱
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Su Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　锱; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1310 Page 12
[Tang Yun] side holding cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Zhuang holding cut,? Yin Su. 【Said the text】This is made by Ning. Six baht too. 【Note to Xunzi·Fu Guo Pian】Eight Liang said 锱. [Zhengzitong] The ancients said that it was slight to compete against the baht. Xunzi mistakenly said Yunbaliang said Qi. Zheng Yunqi quoted Xun's note. The rhyme will be annotated with baht, and eight baht is 锱. ?non. From saying that the text is positive.　[Zhuangzi·Xu Wugui] No disciple wing in the palace of the altar. [Note] The altar, the name of the altar.
